name: Root
description: 툴팁의 상태와 동작을 관리하는 최상위 컴포넌트

props.name: open
props.description: Whether the tooltip is currently open.

props.name: render
props.description: 컴포넌트의 HTML 요소를 다른 태그로 대체하거나 다른 컴포넌트와 조합할 수 있습니다. 렌더링할 요소를 반환하는 `ReactElement` 또는 함수를 인수로 받습니다.

props.name: defaultOpen
props.description:
Whether the tooltip is initially open.

To render a controlled tooltip, use the `open` prop instead.

props.name: onOpenChange
props.description: Event handler called when the tooltip is opened or closed.

props.name: onOpenChangeComplete
props.description: Event handler called after any animations complete when the tooltip is opened or closed.

props.name: hoverable
props.description: Whether the tooltip contents can be hovered without closing the tooltip.

props.name: trackCursorAxis
props.description: Determines which axis the tooltip should track the cursor on.

props.name: delay
props.description: How long to wait before opening the tooltip. Specified in milliseconds.

props.name: closeDelay
props.description: How long to wait before closing the tooltip. Specified in milliseconds.

props.name: actionsRef
props.description:
A ref to imperative actions.
- `unmount`: When specified, the tooltip will not be unmounted when closed.
Instead, the `unmount` function must be called to unmount the tooltip manually.
Useful when the tooltip's animation is controlled by an external library.
